channel.title: Argentina – Vamos a Bailar
channel.description: A traveling blog for discovering South America

item.title: A week dancing tango in Buenos Aires
item.dc:creator: eric
item.description:
Milongas Mamerta A Milonga every Tuesday, with a class and a live band. As everybody knows each other, it is really friendly. However, the place is quite small. I met my tango group friends there last November. Since we continue to meet every Tuesday. Club Premier A Milonga on Thursday with the Milonga style that […]

The post A week dancing tango in Buenos Aires appeared first on Vamos a Bailar.

item.title: Behind the giant Buenos Aires, discover Rosario the peaceful city
item.dc:creator: eric
item.description:
I discover Rosario on a short stay. I walk in the city for discovering the monuments and the river. On top of that, I tried my best time ever Alfajo, the Alfajo de Santafesino. Alfajo de Santafesino Those are the specific Alfajo in the region of Santa Fe. Called Alfajo de Santafesino, they are my […]

The post Behind the giant Buenos Aires, discover Rosario the peaceful city appeared first on Vamos a Bailar.

item.title: A stop in Cordoba on the way to Buenos Aires
item.dc:creator: eric
item.description:
I only stayed in Cordoba two nights during my transit from San Juan to Buenos Aires. I was looking for some Tango, but I didn’t find much about it. On top of that, it rained a lot. Thus, I didn’t visit the place as well. My first Argentinian meal: Locro My biggest surprise in Cordoba […]

The post A stop in Cordoba on the way to Buenos Aires appeared first on Vamos a Bailar.

item.title: Ischigualasto Park: a journey to the moon
item.dc:creator: eric
item.description:
Ischigualasto park is a million-years-old park with many landscapes and sculpted rocks. Located close to another famous park called Talampaya, Ischigualasto park will make you believe in visiting the moon. I took advantage to be in San Juan for visiting the park. Ischigualasto Park Presentation Ischigualasto park also called Valle de la Luna ( Moon […]

The post Ischigualasto Park: a journey to the moon appeared first on Vamos a Bailar.

item.title: Adventure on top of the mountains: Trekking Cruce Sierra de Marquesado in San Juan
item.dc:creator: eric
item.description:
Ready to discover the region of San Juan with a trek crossing from one valley to another one. It is among my best treks mainly for two reasons: the variety of the landscapes and the adventurous side of the track. Trekking Cruce Sierra de Marquesado The walk The trekking Cruce Sierra de Marquesado is a […]

The post Adventure on top of the mountains: Trekking Cruce Sierra de Marquesado in San Juan appeared first on Vamos a Bailar.

item.title: Tasting on the road wine of San Juan
item.dc:creator: eric
item.description:
The region of San Juan is an important wine producing region like Mendoza. While I visited many wineries in Mendoza, I just decided to visit two in San Juan. I haven’t much time with the other activities I did. General information All the wineries are reachable with public bus. The cost of a single ticket […]

The post Tasting on the road wine of San Juan appeared first on Vamos a Bailar.

item.title: Discovering San Juan region between vineyards and mountains
item.dc:creator: eric
item.description:
San Juan located 200 kms from Mendoza. Beyond the similarities with Mendoza due to the proximity, the region of San Juan has its own particularities. Many mountains and vineyard to discover that create incredible landscapes. Discovering San Juan region You can reach San Juan from Mendoza with a bus that costs 185AR$ and takes 2h30. […]

The post Discovering San Juan region between vineyards and mountains appeared first on Vamos a Bailar.

item.title: Classes and Milongas for dancing tango in Mendoza
item.dc:creator: eric
item.description:
After almost 2 months of traveling far from the Milongas, I decided to start again tango. In this article, I present the classes and the Milongas where I have been in Mendoza. Learning in good classes Ana & Luis The classes from Ana & Luis are on Monday and Thursday from 9pm to 11pm. When […]

The post Classes and Milongas for dancing tango in Mendoza appeared first on Vamos a Bailar.

item.title: A hike to the Aconcagua, the highest mountain in South America
item.dc:creator: eric
item.description:
After crossing the Andes a first time during my way from Santiago to Mendoza, I decided to come back to the Andes. At an altitude of 3000 meters, a trek starts to the first base camp on the way to the Aconcagua. Aconcagua is the highest mountain in South America with 6 962 meters high. […]

The post A hike to the Aconcagua, the highest mountain in South America appeared first on Vamos a Bailar.

item.title: Improve your tasting skills in Lujan de Cuyo Mendoza
item.dc:creator: eric
item.description:
I did two trips to the valley of Lujan de Cuyo. One for trying an educational tasting in the winery Dolium. Where the owner is aside you and teach you how to improve your tasting methods. The other one for discovering among the best of the valley through classical tastings. An educational tasting in winery […]

The post Improve your tasting skills in Lujan de Cuyo Mendoza appeared first on Vamos a Bailar.
